author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The `trackingMkFit` process modifier is of historic origin and it's not actively used in any production code.
I remove it here as it can create confusions, as well as updating the documentation and one configuration file that relied on it.
I profit of this PR to introduce a unit test for `testDumpMkFitGeometry`.

#### PR validation:

Added unit test is running.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Replace `trackingMkFit` with `trackingMkFitDevel` modifier
